content: beginning of round marker this marker is the new end of round 151 round 2 c1- k to end sts increases will now only be at the center of cowl garter stripes - work rounds 1-12 once then round 2 rs p to m k1 p to end work rounds 11-12 three more times round 3 k to m m1l k1 m1r k to end 153 sts round 1 c1- k to m m1l k1 m1r k to end 212 sts round 4 p to m k1 p to last stitch pfb 154 sts round 2 c1- p to m k1 p to end round 3 c1- k to m m1l k1 m1r k to end 214 slip_stitch - work rounds 1-8 five times then sts work rounds 1-2 once round 4 c1- p to m k1 p to end >join c2 >join c2 round 1 c2- k1 sl1wyib to m m1l sl1wyib m1r sl1wyib k1 to last st sl1wyib round 5 c2- k to m m1l k1 m1r k to end 216 156 164 172 180 188 196 sts sts round 2 c2- p1 sl1wyib to end round 6 c2- p to m k1 p to end monsterknits good karma 3 0 12/23 p age | 4 >cut c2 >repeat rounds 11-12 three more times 224 226 228 sts round 7 c1- k to m m1l k1 m1r k to end 218 sts bind off using icelandic bind off round 8 c1- p to m k1 p to end k1 *slip_stitch from right needle to left needle >join c3 purlwise insert right needle purlwise into first round 9 c3- k to m m1l k1 m1r k to end 220 stitch on left needle then knitwise into second sts stitch to catch front loop of second stitch draw front loop of second stitch through first stitch and round 10 c3- p to m k1 p to end knit it drop both stitches from left needle repeat >cut c3 from * round 11 c1- k to m m1l k1 m1r k to end 222 sts tutorial at-https //knitfreedom com/icelandic- bind-off/ round 12 c1- p to m k1 p to end do you have a question found a mistake please email me 20 monsterknit@gmail com 6 back length 19 monsterknits good karma 3 0 12/23
